OrgName: Insperity Financial Solutions, a division of Insperity Business Services, L.P.
activities: Insperity Financial Solutions offers solutions that automate expense reporting, enforce corporate travel policies, streamline management and provide visibility into a company’s expenditures through data collection, analytics and reporting.  When accessing the software, data from Switzerland is sent to ExpensAble’s servers, which are located in The Woodlands,Texas or Bryan, Texas.  These servers then send data back to the users’ local approvers.
contactoff1: Insperity Financial Solutions (Attn: Web Support (Privacy Policy Inquiry))
